examples.korean: The White House was swift to deny the rumours. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 백악관은 재빨리 그 소문을 부인했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The White House was swift to deny the rumours. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Rumours are rife that he is going to resign. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 사임할 것이라는 소문이 널리 퍼져 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Rumours are rife that he is going to resign. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She kept them plentifully supplied with gossip. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그들에게 소문을 계속 풍부하게 제공했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She kept them plentifully supplied with gossip. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The police moved quickly to dispel the rumours. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경찰이 그 소문을 불식시키기 위해 재빨리 조치를 취했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The police moved quickly to dispel the rumours. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Rumours of his resignation swept through the company. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 사임한다는 소문이 회사 전체에 급속히 퍼졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Rumours of his resignation swept through the company. Add to Wordbook
